Player History
Drafted in 17th round, 271st overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/22/2015...
10/5/2015: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $10,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 7/21/2017 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/25/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
